mapper.insert: insert into school_info (add_time, address, belong, city_name, content, create_date, dual_class_name, email, f211, f985, level_name, name, school_id, nature_name, phone, province_id, province_name, school_nature_name, type_name, school_site, site, logo, area) values (#{add_time}, #{address}, #{belong}, #{city_name}, #{content}, #{create_date}, #{dual_class_name}, #{email}, #{f211}, #{f985}, #{level_name}, #{name}, #{school_id}, #{nature_name}, #{phone}, #{province_id}, #{province_name}, #{school_nature_name}, #{type_name}, #{school_site}, #{site}, #{logo}, #{area})
